body_html: @ibab I'd recommend that you create a separate PR to update Eigen. From time to time we hit a compatibility issue, and we need to update TensorFlow as well. It's best to have a standalone PR that contains both the Eigen update and the corresponding TF changes.
body_text: @ibab I'd recommend that you create a separate PR to update Eigen. From time to time we hit a compatibility issue, and we need to update TensorFlow as well. It's best to have a standalone PR that contains both the Eigen update and the corresponding TF changes.
